contents: 2. leaves 7b-14b: Risālah fī al-dhikr al-jahrī wa-al-wajd wa-al-dawarān.
3. leaves 15b-34b: Najāt al-ummah fī iṭāʻat al-aʼimmah.
4. leaves 35b-39b: Kalām Ḥaḍrat ʻAlī. Proverbs of ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib arranged alphabetically.
6. leaves 55a-56b: Ḥikāyat sabab islām Kaʻb al-Aḥbār.
7. leaves 60b-64b: al-Risālah al-ṣāliḥīyah fī al-ʻamal bi-al-rubʻ al-sharqī al-shamālī al-maqṭūʻ.
8. leaves 65b-68a: al-Risālah al-ṣāliḥīyah li-taḥṣīl al-aʻmāl al-jaybīyah.
10. leaves 78a-81b: al-Nashr al-muṭayyab fī al-ʻamal bi-al-rubʻ al-mujayyab.
subject: ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, Caliph, approximately 600-661
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
